articles.content:
DPRK delegation inspects Shanghai 
    Shanghai, June 6 (KCNA) -- The DPRK delegation led by Kim Yong Nam, President of the presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, on an official goodwill visit to the People's Republic of China inspected Shanghai on Sunday.   The delegation visited the memorial hall of the first congress of the Communist Party of China rebuilt and expanded in the city and Shanghai Museum.   
   On the same day, they met senior officials of the Shanghai municipal people's government.
   In the evening the mayor of the Shanghai municipal people's government gave a reception in honor of the DPRK delegation.

Greetings to King of Sweden
    Pyongyang, June 7 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, President of the presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, sent a message of greetings to Carl Gustaf, King of Sweden, on June 5 on the occasion of its National Day.
   The message extended warm congratulations to the King and people of Sweden on the National Day and sincerely wished Sweden prosperity.

DPRK delegation leaves Shanghai
   Shanghai, June 7 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea headed by Kim Yong Nam, President of the presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, left Shanghai this afternoon by special plane after successfully winding up its official goodwill visit to the People's Republic of China.   
   The delegation was seen off at the airport by a vice-mayor of the Shanghai municipal people's government, a vice-chairman of the standing committee of the Shanghai municipal people's congress, the Chinese ambassador to Korea and other officials concerned.
   Also present there to send off the delegation were the DPRK ambassador to China and embassy officials.
   This morning the delegation visited streets in Shanghai and other places.
